std_inline.citation:
'''Baptism''': "eGGSA Baptism Registers, Sophia Elizabeth Smith"
Source: Nederduits Gereformeerde Gemeente (NGK), Swartland (Malmesbury), Baptism register, 1745-1782, page 78. Repository: NG Kerkargief, Noordwal-Wes, Stellenbosch, G5 3/2. Note: Folios 13 and 14, two sides of one page, are almost certainly missing between the current pages numbered 12 and 13 - dates covered would be late August 1751 to early June 1752.. Transcribed by Lizette Svoboda, from photographs of Cape Archives VC 666
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBaptisms.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Child with smith anywhere in the surname with sophia elisabeth anywhere in the first name in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Sophia Elizabeth Smith baptism on 5 Mar 1769, daughter of Cristoffel Smith & Maria van Weijk.

std_narrative.citation:
Sophia, daughter of Cristoffel Smith & Maria van Weijk, was baptised on 5 March 1769. '''Baptism''': "eGGSA Baptism Registers, Sophia Elizabeth Smith"
Source: Nederduits Gereformeerde Gemeente (NGK), Swartland (Malmesbury), Baptism register, 1745-1782, page 78. Repository: NG Kerkargief, Noordwal-Wes, Stellenbosch, G5 3/2. Note: Folios 13 and 14, two sides of one page, are almost certainly missing between the current pages numbered 12 and 13 - dates covered would be late August 1751 to early June 1752.. Transcribed by Lizette Svoboda, from photographs of Cape Archives VC 666
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBaptisms.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Child with smith anywhere in the surname with sophia elisabeth anywhere in the first name in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Sophia Elizabeth Smith baptism on 5 Mar 1769, daughter of Cristoffel Smith & Maria van Weijk.
